channel.title: Server Issue
channel.description: Hello, I am writing a server from scratch(same project, different structure), but I am having an issue with the packets somewhere. I get the server to write the sidebar interfaces, and you can switch them, but the main game screen remains black, with the "Loading - please wait" text in the middle, and whenever i switch tabs, the client starts sending random packets to the server. Any idea what causes this?

item.title: Server Issue
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Hello, I am writing a server from scratch(same project, different structure), but I am having an issue with the packets somewhere. I get the server to write the sidebar interfaces, and you can switch them, but the main game screen remains black, with the “Loading - please wait” text in the middle, and whenever i switch tabs, the client starts sending random packets to the server. Any idea what causes this?
